# Create Block

Creates a batch of children blocks for a given block and inserts them at a specific location. The return value of this API is the rich text content of the newly created children blocks.{Try it}(url=/api/tools/api_explore/api_explore_config?project=docx&version=v1&resource=document.block.children&method=create)

<md-alert type="tip">
**Application frequency limit:** the maximum frequency of a single application call is 3 times per second, beyond which the interface will return HTTP status code <font color="blue">400</font> and error code <font color="blue">99991400</font>.

**Document frequency limit**: The maximum number of concurrent edits per second for a single document is 3. If the frequency limit is exceeded, the interface will return HTTP status code <font color="blue">429</font>. The edit operations include:

- Create Blocks
- Delete Blocks
- Update Block
- Batch Update Blocks

When a request is frequency-limited, the application needs to handle the frequency-limited status code and use an exponential fallback algorithm or some other frequency-control strategy to reduce the rate of calls to the API.
</md-alert>
:::

	<md-dt-td>
	Created child blocks will be inserted into the specified block children list at the index position. The starting value of index is 0, and the maximum value is the length of the children of the specified block. When index is -1, created child blocks will be inserted at the end of the list.
